sections.description: The fastest and only feature-complete SEO plugin that follows the guidelines and rules imposed by WordPress and search engines. Start using proven SEO tactics to improve your websiteâ€™s ranking. Clean, dedicated, extensible, unrestricted, ad-free, and no strings attached.
sections.installation:
Install The SEO Framework either via your WordPress dashboard using plugin search or by uploading the files to your server.
Either network-activate this plugin or activate it on a single site.
That's it! The plugin now improves your website with SEO. It also protects your website against SEO attacks.
